Reviews.Title: Nice phone!
Reviews.Author: Melvin V.
Reviews.Content: Best unlocked Windows 8 cellphone! It comes with the camera grip on the package so you don't need to buy it later on.

Reviews.Title: Ring Volume Problem
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Sun
Reviews.Content: The One thing I don't like is that you cannot save the ring volume setting, that is every time you turn the phone off the volume level goes down to zero no matter what you set it the last time in use!!!
